CmdLine: apt-get -qq update && apt-get -y upgrade && 	apt install -y wget unzip make g++
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: wget https://github.com/aquaskyline/SOAPdenovo2/archive/master.zip -O /opt/master.zip && 	cd /opt && unzip master.zip && 	rm master.zip && 	cd /opt/SOAPdenovo2-master/ && 	make
Commands.Name: run
